meanings.definition: A mechanism that temporarily holds a moving part in a specific position.
meanings.sent1: The detents on the gear shifter kept the car in the correct gear.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to feel the detents click into place when adjusting the settings.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat played with the detents on the sliding door, causing it to get stuck.
meanings.sent4: Her determination acted like the detents, locking her focus on the task at hand.
meanings.sent5: The detents acted like tiny anchors, securing the parts in place.

meanings.definition: A notch or groove that prevents accidental movement or rotation.
meanings.sent1: He felt the detents on the dial, ensuring he wouldn't turn it too far.
meanings.sent2: The detents on the wheel provided a tactile indication of each position.
meanings.sent3: The detents on the puzzle piece made it challenging to fit into place.
meanings.sent4: The detents in the road guided the car smoothly around the curve.
meanings.sent5: The detents on the lock clicked reassuringly, signaling security.

meanings.definition: A device used to control the movement of a machine or tool.
meanings.sent1: The detents on the control panel allowed for precise adjustments.
meanings.sent2: She carefully turned the detents to regulate the speed of the conveyor belt.
meanings.sent3: The detents on the remote control made it easy to switch between channels.
meanings.sent4: His words acted as detents, directing the flow of the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The detents on the lever ensured safe operation of the equipment.
